summary: An Ordinance amending Section 1 of Ordinance No. 16004, entitled "An Ordinance to regulate the keeping of certain animals and fowls within the limits of the City of Seattle, prescribing limits within which certain animals and fowls shall be permitted to run at large, providing for the impounding of animals and fowls found running at large in violation of this ordinance and for the sale and redemption of the same, providing penalties for the violation of the provisions of this ordinance", approved May 16, 1907.
